org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Interface ClipableTaskInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RunnableInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RunnableTask

    public interface ClipableTaskInterface
    The interface used by Unit to access RunnableTask. RunnableTasks implement the data handling capability of a Task.

    • Method Detail

      • getClipIn

        java.lang.Object getClipIn(java.lang.String name)
        Returns:
        the clip-in in the clip-in bucket with the specified name

      • getClipIn

        java.lang.Object getClipIn(java.lang.Object data,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Returns:
        the clip-in in with the specified name that arrived with the given object. Only the clip-ins of the objects for the current process can be retrieved.

      • isClipInName

        boolean isClipInName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns:
        true if a clip-in with the specified name exists in the clip-in bucket,

      • putClipIn

        void putClipIn(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.Object clipin)
        Put the specified clip-in in the clip-in bucket

      • queueClipIn

        void queueClipIn(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.Object clipin)
        Queue the specified clip-in to be inserted into the clip-in bucket when the task is next run

      • removeClipIn

        java.lang.Object removeClipIn(java.lang.String name)
        Remove the clip-in with the specified name from the clip-in bucket
        Returns:
        the removed clip-in (or null if unknown)

      • extractClipInState

        ClipInStore extractClipInState()
        Returns:
        a store of the state of the current clip-in bucket

      • restoreClipInState

        void restoreClipInState(ClipInStore store)
        Restores a previously stored clip-in bucket state
